org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb.dialect.impl

Class MongoHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb.dialect.impl.MongoHelpers

  • public class MongoHelpers
extends Object
    Provides functionality for dealing with (nested) fields of MongoDB documents.
    Author:
    Alan Fitton <alan at eth0.org.uk>, Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>, Gunnar Morling

      • flatten

        public static String flatten(String left,
             String right)
        Links the two field names into a single left.right field name. If the left field is empty, right is returned
        Parameters:
        left - one field name
        right - the other field name
        Returns:
        left.right or right if left is an empty string
